sentences.en: A far better approach is to use an outsider as a collaborator.
sentences.cn: 比较恰当的方法是,跟这些外部专家合作.

sentences.en: Chinese - American pop star Leehom Wang portrays Kuang Yumin, a student collaborator of Wang Jiazhi's.
sentences.cn: 此外,歌星王立宏将出演王佳芝的同学和合作者邝裕民.

sentences.en: Collaborator Shanghai JH Architects and Shanghai Institute of Architectural Design and Research Co Ltd.
sentences.cn: 上海JH建筑事务所和上海现代建筑设计研究院.

sentences.en: collaborators on a biography of Dickens
His collaborator, Hooke, was of a different opinion.
sentences.cn: 他的合作者霍克持有不同的看法.

sentences.en: I need a collaborator to help me.
sentences.cn: 我需要个人跟我合作,帮我的忙.

sentences.en: If I was a collaborator , so were all my neighbours.
sentences.cn: 假如我是通敌者, 我的乡邻们也都不例外.

sentences.en: On the contrary, Dr. Xue was a very weak collaborator.
sentences.cn: 相反的, 薛博士是一名很差劲的合作者.

sentences.en: Their job was to identify enemy collaborators.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作是找出通敌者。

trans.tran_en: someone who works with other people or groups in order to achieve something, especially in science or art
